heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Periods of showers or drizzle, except a steadier rain in the St. Lawrence Valley. Highs from the upper 40s to mid 50s, some mid 40s far north. East winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the south, and to 50 mph late in the advisory area.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy with periods of rain. Lows in the low to mid 40s north, mid to upper 40s in the south. East winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph, and gusting to 50 mph in the advisory area.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy. Some steadier rain possible early, mainly north, otherwise scattered to numerous showers. Highs in the low to mid 50s, but with temperatures steady or falling in the afternoon. East winds becoming southwest 10 to 15 mph, and gusting to 30 mph.
